# Annex III - Declaration of Data Protection {-}

Please download and fill out the following declaration of data protection and confidentially agreement for survey administrators and return to info\@act-on-gender.eu 

Download declaration in [PDF](https://act-on-gender.eu/geam-manual/files/ACT_SurveyPreLaunch_DataAgr.pdf), [MS Word](https://act-on-gender.eu/geam-manual/files/ACT_SurveyPreLaunch_DataAgr.docx), or [LibreOffice](https://act-on-gender.eu/geam-manual/files/ACT_SurveyPreLaunch_DataAgr.odt) formats. 

Upon reception, we will change permissions for survey administrators to launch the survey.
